name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Yes, a squirrel can be an Idol, too #AyundaRisu3D【Ayunda Risu ⧸ hololive ID 】 [VxnwBm49egM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu performs a 3D live cover of the song 'Hello/How Are You' in a cozy bedroom setting.
Ayunda Risu transitions into the MC section, excitedly greeting the viewers in English and Indonesian.

subtitles.original: ハロー　窓を開けて　小さく呟いた
subtitles.english: Hello, I opened the window and whispered softly

subtitles.original: ハウアーユー　誰もいない　部屋で一人
subtitles.english: How are you? Alone in a room with no one else

subtitles.original: モーニング　朝が来たよ　どしゃ降りの朝が
subtitles.english: Morning, the morning has come, a downpouring morning

subtitles.original: ティクタック　私のネジを　誰か巻いて
subtitles.english: Tick-tock, someone please wind up my spring

subtitles.original: ハロ/ハワユ
subtitles.english: Hello/How Are You

subtitles.original: Lyrics & Composition: ナノウ
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: Nanou

subtitles.original: ハロー　昔のアニメに　そんなのいたっけな
subtitles.english: Hello, was there something like that in an old anime?

subtitles.original: ハウアーユー　羨ましいな　皆に愛されて
subtitles.english: How are you? I'm so jealous, being loved by everyone

subtitles.original: スリーピー　馬鹿なこと言ってないで　支度をしなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Sleepy, stop talking nonsense and get ready

subtitles.original: クライ　涙の跡を隠すため
subtitles.english: Cry, to hide the traces of my tears

subtitles.original: もう口癖になった「まぁいっか」
subtitles.english: The phrase "Oh well" has become a habit

subtitles.original: 昨日の言葉がふと頭をよぎる
subtitles.english: Yesterday's words suddenly cross my mind

subtitles.original: 「もう君には全然期待してないから」
subtitles.english: "I don't expect anything from you anymore"

subtitles.original: そりゃまぁ私だって　自分に期待などしてないけれど
subtitles.english: Well, I don't really expect anything from myself either, but...

subtitles.original: あれは一体どういうつもりですか
subtitles.english: What on earth did you mean by that?

subtitles.original: 喉元まで出かかった言葉
subtitles.english: The words that were about to come out of my throat

subtitles.original: 口を突いて出たのは嘘
subtitles.english: But what came out of my mouth was a lie

subtitles.original: こうして今日も私は貴重な
subtitles.english: And so today, I continue to use

subtitles.original: 言葉を使い分けて生きてゆく
subtitles.english: These precious words differently as I live on

subtitles.original: なぜ隠してしまうのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you hide it?

subtitles.original: 笑われるのが怖いのですか
subtitles.english: Are you afraid of being laughed at?

subtitles.original: 誰にも会いたくないのですか
subtitles.english: Do you not want to see anyone?

subtitles.original: それ本当ですか
subtitles.english: Is that really true?

subtitles.original: 曖昧という名の海に溺れて
subtitles.english: Drowning in a sea called ambiguity

subtitles.original: 息も出来ないほど苦しいの
subtitles.english: It's so painful I can't even breathe

subtitles.original: 少し声が聞きたくなりました
subtitles.english: I wanted to hear your voice a little bit

subtitles.original: 本当に弱いな
subtitles.english: I'm really weak

subtitles.original: 一向に進まない支度の途中
subtitles.english: In the middle of getting ready, which isn't progressing

subtitles.original: 朦朧とした頭で思う
subtitles.english: I think with a hazy head

subtitles.original: 「もう理由を付けて休んでしまおうかな」
subtitles.english: "Maybe I'll just make up an excuse and take the day off"

subtitles.original: いやいや分かってますって
subtitles.english: No, no, I know

subtitles.original: なんとなく言ってみただけだよ
subtitles.english: I just said it for no reason

subtitles.original: 分かってるから怒らないでよ
subtitles.english: I know, so please don't be mad

subtitles.original: 幸せだろうと不幸せだろうと
subtitles.english: Whether I'm happy or unhappy

subtitles.original: 平等に残酷に朝は来る
subtitles.english: The morning comes equally and cruelly

subtitles.original: 生きていくだけで精一杯の私に
subtitles.english: To me, who's doing my best just to keep living

subtitles.original: これ以上何を望むというの
subtitles.english: What more do you want from me?

subtitles.original: なぜ気にしてしまうのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you care?

subtitles.original: 本当は愛されたいのですか
subtitles.english: Do you actually want to be loved?

subtitles.original: その手を離したのは誰ですか
subtitles.english: Who was the one who let go of that hand?

subtitles.original: 気が付いてますか
subtitles.english: Do you realize it?

subtitles.original: 人生にタイムカードがあるなら
subtitles.english: If there were a time card for life

subtitles.original: 終わりの時間はいつなんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder when the clock-out time would be

subtitles.original: 私が生きた分の給料は
subtitles.english: To whom should the salary

subtitles.original: 誰に払うのですか
subtitles.english: For the time I've lived be paid?

subtitles.original: サンキュー
subtitles.english: Thank you

subtitles.original: ありがとうと言いたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to say thank you

subtitles.original: サンキュー
subtitles.english: Thank you

subtitles.original: ありがとうと言いたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to say thank you

subtitles.original: サンキュー
subtitles.english: Thank you

subtitles.original: 一度だけでもいいから
subtitles.english: Even just once is enough

subtitles.original: 心の底から大泣きしながら
subtitles.english: While crying from the bottom of my heart

subtitles.original: ありがとうと言いたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to say thank you

subtitles.original: なぜ隠してしまうのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you hide it?

subtitles.original: 本当は聞いて欲しいのですか
subtitles.english: Do you actually want someone to listen?

subtitles.original: 絶対に笑ったりしないから
subtitles.english: I definitely won't laugh

subtitles.original: 話してみませんか
subtitles.english: So won't you try talking to me?

subtitles.original: 口を開かなければ分からない
subtitles.english: If you don't open your mouth, I won't know

subtitles.original: 思ってるだけでは伝わらない
subtitles.english: Just thinking it won't get through

subtitles.original: なんて面倒くさい生き物でしょう
subtitles.english: What a troublesome creature

subtitles.original: 人間というのは
subtitles.english: Humans are

subtitles.original: ハロー
subtitles.english: Hello

subtitles.original: ハウアーユー
subtitles.english: How are you

subtitles.original: ハロー
subtitles.english: Hello

subtitles.original: ハウアーユー
subtitles.english: How are you

subtitles.original: ハロー
subtitles.english: Hello

subtitles.original: ハウアーユー
subtitles.english: How are you

subtitles.original: あなたに　ハロー　ハウアーユー
subtitles.english: To you, hello, how are you

subtitles.original: Hi! Wah, Hello, How are you?
subtitles.english: Hi! Wah, Hello, How are you?

subtitles.original: How are you guys? How are you people?
subtitles.english: How are you guys? How are you people?

subtitles.original: Oh my God! Woo!
subtitles.english: Oh my God! Woo!

subtitles.original: Ini ya guys ya, ada...
subtitles.english: So, guys, there is...

subtitles.original: ...ada satu di mana... orang-orang tuh masih kaget gitu.
subtitles.english: ...there's one thing where... people are still shocked like that.
